prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing thank-you greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

üé® CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clich√© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Lots of baseball references "
Style: üñºÔ∏è Impressionist
Tone: ‚ù§Ô∏è Heartfelt - sincere and emotional
To: Evan 
From: Mursal
Message: "Thank you for being the world‚Äôs most generous host ‚ô•Ô∏è"

Reference: "Cute "

CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front ‚Üí interior ‚Üí back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the sincere and emotional tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way






- Create cartoon/illustrated characters inspired by reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions

Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "thank-you" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. I have included my own reference image. Create a stylized cartoon/illustrated character inspired by the reference image - DO NOT make realistic depictions of real people, instead create charming cartoon-style characters with simplified, friendly features. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in impressionist painting style like Monet and Renoir, with soft brush strokes, light and shadow play, and dreamy atmospheric effects

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a thank-you card with sincere and emotional tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in impressionist painting style like Monet and Renoir, with soft brush strokes, light and shadow play, and dreamy atmospheric effects

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Include message text: "Thank you for being the world‚Äôs most generous host ‚ô•Ô∏è" positioned safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image) integrated into beautiful, innovative decorative artwork. HANDWRITING STYLE: Write the message in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that feels elegant and personal. The handwriting should be legible, flowing, and have natural character - not overly perfect but graceful and warm. Use a nice pen-style appearance with natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight. Think of sophisticated calligraphy that's still approachable and easy to read. Make the handwriting feel genuine and heartfelt. Think beyond typical florals and patterns - create something unexpected and artistic that perfectly frames the handwritten message - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clich√© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in impressionist painting style like Monet and Renoir, with soft brush strokes, light and shadow play, and dreamy atmospheric effects

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in impressionist painting style like Monet and Renoir, with soft brush strokes, light and shadow play, and dreamy atmospheric effects

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover: Front cover of a greeting card with a warm, impressionist painting style. The color palette is dominated by rich yellows, oranges, and greens, evoking a sunny outdoor atmosphere. Two charming, stylized cartoon characters are the main subjects. On the right is a boy in a baseball uniform, wearing a red cap with a "TP" logo and holding a baseball bat. His uniform is white with red trim and the word "Falcons" and the number "25" in red lettering. On the left is a girl wearing a light brown hijab and a mustard-colored sweater. A baseball is suspended in the air between them. The text "Thank you, Evan!" is written in elegant, flowing cursive script in a dark brown color, positioned in the upper center of the card, safely away from the edges. The background depicts a soft-focus outdoor scene with trees and foliage, rendered with visible, textured brushstrokes characteristic of Impressionism. The overall mood is heartfelt and joyful.
generatedPrompts.backCover:
```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover design for a greeting card with a heartfelt and impressionist theme. The scene is set on a sunny, grassy field, evoking a warm and nostalgic atmosphere. A vintage-style baseball glove, worn and weathered, rests open on the grass, cradling a baseball within its pocket. Scattered around the glove are a few fallen autumn leaves in warm hues of orange and red. The background transitions from a soft, hazy yellow-green sky to the textured green grass, all rendered with loose, visible brushstrokes characteristic of impressionism, reminiscent of Monet's work. The overall color palette is soft and muted, focusing on earthy tones and gentle sunlight. \"Thank you\" is written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script, positioned safely in the center area, feeling warm and personal. The impressionist style is maintained throughout with soft light and shadow play creating a dreamy, atmospheric effect. 9:16 aspect ratio, full-bleed.",
  "backCover": "Back cover design for a greeting card with a heartfelt and impressionist theme. This design offers a peaceful resolution to the visual story, subtly referencing elements from the front cover. The focus is on a serene, impressionistic depiction of a grassy field under a soft, diffused light, similar to the front cover's atmosphere. Instead of the glove and ball, the composition features a few scattered, soft-edged autumn leaves in muted orange and red hues, gently falling or resting on the grass, echoing the motif from the front. The brushwork is impressionistic, with visible, soft strokes that create a textured and atmospheric feel. The color palette remains consistent with soft greens, yellows, and subtle warm tones. There is no text. The design is minimal and serene, concentrating decorative elements towards the center and left side. The bottom-right corner area is left completely clear and undecorated to reserve space for a QR code. 9:16 aspect ratio, full-bleed.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior design for a greeting card with a heartfelt and impressionist theme. This section, with complete creative freedom, expands on the story with an innovative and unexpected element. It features a serene impressionist painting of a sun-drenched baseball field in autumn. The grass is rendered with thick, visible brushstrokes in varying shades of green and gold, capturing the dappled sunlight. In the distance, soft, hazy trees with touches of autumnal color are visible, creating depth and atmosphere. The sky is a soft gradient of pale yellow to light blue, with indistinct cloud forms. The overall mood is peaceful and reflective, maintaining the heartfelt tone. There are no people or characters in this scene. The composition is designed to be visually harmonious with the overall card style, using a soft color palette and impressionistic techniques like Monet and Renoir. 9:16 aspect ratio, full-bleed.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior design for a greeting card with a heartfelt and impressionist theme, serving as the story's climax. The message 'Thank you for being the world‚Äôs most generous host ‚ô•Ô∏è' is presented in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script, designed with a natural ink flow and slight variations in line weight, feeling elegant yet warm and personal. This script is integrated into a visually rich, impressionistic artwork. The artwork depicts a soft, sunlit scene where the grass subtly transitions into a textured background of warm, blurred colors‚Äîperhaps suggesting a cozy, inviting space or the lingering warmth of a gathering. Scattered throughout the artwork, but not intruding on the message, are gentle, impressionistic representations of elements related to hosting or generosity, such as soft glowing orbs of light or abstract swirls of comforting colors, all rendered with soft brushstrokes. The overall impression is one of warmth, gratitude, and refined beauty, perfectly framing the heartfelt message while maintaining the cohesive impressionist style. 9:16 aspect ratio, full-bleed."
}
```
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card, in the impressionist painting style of Monet and Renoir, featuring a baseball field at dusk. The scene is dominated by the soft glow of string lights outlining the infield, creating a warm, inviting rhombus shape. The grass of the outfield is rendered in deep, textured blues and greens, with subtle hints of purple in the fading light of the sky above. The home plate area and pitcher's mound are subtly suggested with softer, more diffused brushstrokes, bathed in the warm light emanating from the infield boundary. The overall effect is dreamy and atmospheric, evoking a heartfelt and nostalgic mood. The composition is a full-bleed, with no text or characters present, focusing entirely on the evocative landscape and the interplay of light and shadow, adhering to a 9:16 ratio and ensuring key elements are kept away from the edges for printing.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with "Thank you for being the world‚Äôs most generous host ‚ô•Ô∏è" written in a warm, slightly textured, elegant cursive brown ink. The background is an impressionist painting of a baseball field at dusk, with soft, blended brushstrokes creating a dreamy atmosphere. The field is depicted in muted greens and earthy browns, with a hint of dirt infield. In the background, two stadium lights cast a soft, yellow glow, their light bleeding into the hazy sky, which is a mix of soft blues and oranges. The overall tone is heartfelt and sincere, with the impressionist style creating a sense of nostalgic warmth. The text is centered and clearly readable, with a small, simple brown heart placed below the word "host". The 9:16 aspect ratio is maintained, with the full-bleed background extending to all edges.
